ygData.subject: Re: re: Duster Models
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ve had one of those packs for a few weeks now.  Got it for the Duster quest.  It s a nice item, but it s NOT a weight-reducing pack.  It s just a 10-slot
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, Dec 15, 1999 at 06:26:27AM -0800, Quasinom de Plume wrote:
> From: =?iso-8859-1?q?Quasinom=20de=20Plume?= <eqmailing@...>
>
> I can confrim this as I completed the duster quest last night and got the
> Bootstrutters Pack (Isn't the Gnome who gives you the Jboots quest named
> Bootstrutter? Heh - anyone try giving him his pack back? Just an idea).

I've had one of those packs for a few weeks now. Got it for the Duster
quest. It's a nice item, but it's NOT a weight-reducing pack. It's just a
10-slot backpack, lore, nodrop.

> These junk items that you talk about - I've never seen them before.
> Gnomish Glow Rods? Perhaps these are the rods needed for the thermal
> cloak... I just received a patchwork cloak after completing the Red V
> quest - I'll try to do the Duster and scrap metal quests a few more times
> to get these Rods and try a few combinations.

I also have a Gnome Glow Rod. I got it for turning in scrap metal. As far
as I can tell, it's just a light source. I have had comments from people
asking me what the heck I was carrying, so they don't seem to be that
common.

Joe D
